Package net.officefloor.plugin.clazz.dependency

Class ClassDependenciesManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.officefloor.plugin.clazz.dependency.ClassDependenciesManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClassDependencies
    public class ClassDependenciesManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClassDependencies
    Manages Class dependencies.
    Author:
    Daniel Sagenschneider
